file.name: payments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/payments:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Create payment
      description: Create a payment and add all the information you need. Remember to add the payment details and the payer's information
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                additional_info:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Data that could improve fraud analysis and conversion rates.
                    Try to send as much information as possible.
                  properties:
                    ip_address:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        IP from where the request comes from (only for bank
                        transfers).
                    items:
                      type: array
                      description: List of items to be paid.
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item code.
                            example: PR0001
                          title:
                            type: string
                            description: Item name.
                            example: Point Mini
                          description:
                            type: string
                            description: Long item description.
                            example: Producto Point para cobros con tarjetas mediante bluetooth
                          picture_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Image URL.
                            example: https://http2.mlstatic.com/resources/frontend/statics/growth-sellers-landings/device-mlb-point-i_medium@2x.png
                          category_id:
                            type: string
                            description: Category of the item.
                            example: electronics
                          quantity:
                            type: number
                            description: Item's quantity.
                            example: 1
                          unit_price:
                            type: number
                            description: Unit price.
                            example: 58.8
                    payer:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer's information.
                      properties:
                        first_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer's name.
                          example: Test
                        last_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer's last name.
                          example: Test
                        phone:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer's phone.
                          properties:
                            area_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Area code.
                              example: 11
                            number:
                              type: string
                              description: Phone number.
                              example: '987654321'
                        address:
                          type: object
                          description: Address.
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip code.
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number.
                        registration_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          description: Date of registration of the buyer on your site.
                    shipments:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping information.
                      properties:
                        receiver_address:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer's address.
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip code.
                              example: 12312-123
                            state_name:
                              type: string
                              description: State.
                              example: Rio de Janeiro
                            city_name:
                              type: string
                              description: City Name.
                              example: Buzios
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                              example: Av das Nacoes Unidas
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number
                              example: 3003
                            floor:
                              type: string
                              description: Floor.
                            apartment:
                              type: string
                              description: Department.
                    barcode:
                      type: object
                      description: Barcode information.
                      properties:
                        type:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/barcode_type'
                        content:
                          type: string
                          description: Barcode generated.
                        width:
                          type: number
                          description: Width of barcode.
                        height:
                          type: number
                          description: Height of barcode.
                application_fee:
                  type: number
                  description: Fee collected by a marketplace or Mercado Pago Application.
                binary_mode:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    When set to true, the payment can only be approved or
                    rejected. Otherwise in_process status is added.
                callback_url:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    URL where mercadopago does the final redirect (only for bank
                    transfers).
                campaign_id:
                  type: number
                  description: Discount campaign ID.
                capture:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Determines if the payment should be captured (true, default
                    value) or just reserved (false).
                coupon_amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Amount of the coupon discount.
                coupon_code:
                  type: string
                  description: Discount campaign with a specific code.
                description:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment reason or item title.
                  example: Payment for product
                differential_pricing_id:
                  type: number
                  description: Id of the scheme for the absorption of financing fee.
                date_of_expiration:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Payment’s expiration date.
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: ID given by the merchant in their system.
                  example: MP0001
                installments:
                  type: number
                  description: Selected quantity of installments.
                  example: 1
                issuer_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment method issuer.
                metadata:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Valid JSON that can be attached to the payment to record
                    additional attributes of the merchant.
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    URL where Mercado Pago will send notifications associated to
                    changes in this payment
                order:
                  type: object
                  description: Order identifier.
                  properties:
                    type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/order_type'
                    id:
                      type: number
                      description: Id of the associated purchase order.
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: Identifies the buyer.
                  properties:
                    entity_type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/entity_type'
                    type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/payer_type'
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: Identification of the associated payer.
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Email.
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification.
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification type.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification number.
                    first_name:
                      type: string
                      description: First name of the associated payer.
                    last_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Last name of the associated payer.
                payment_method_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment method chosen to do the payment.
                  example: visa
                statement_descriptor:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    How will look the payment in the card bill (e.g.:
                    MERCADOPAGO).
                token:
                  type: string
                  description: Card token ID. (Required for credit card)
                transaction_amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Product cost.
                  example: 58.8
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 20359978
                    description: id
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_created
                  date_approved:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_approved
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_last_updated
                  date_of_expiration:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: date_of_expiration
                  money_release_date:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-24T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: money_release_date
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  issuer_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 25
                    description: issuer_id
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: string
                    example: visa
                    description: payment_method_id
                  payment_type_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment_type_id'
                  status:
                   $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                  status_detail:
                    type: string
                    example: accredited
                    description: status_detail
                  currency_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      Point Mini a maquininha que dá o dinheiro de suas vendas
                      na hora
                    description: description
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: live_mode
                  sponsor_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: sponsor_id
                  authorization_code:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: authorization_code
                  money_release_schema:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: money_release_schema
                  taxes_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: taxes_amount
                  counter_currency:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: counter_currency
                  shipping_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: shipping_amount
                  pos_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: pos_id
                  store_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: store_id
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 448876418
                    description: collector_id
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        example: 123
                        description: id
                      email:
                        type: string
                        example: test_user_80507629@testuser.com
                        description: email
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 19119119100
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: CPF
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                      type:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/payer_type'
                    description: payer
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                    description: metadata
                  additional_info:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      items:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: PR0001
                              description: id
                            title:
                              type: string
                              example: Point Mini
                              description: title
                            description:
                              type: string
                              example: >-
                                Producto Point para cobros con tarjetas mediante
                                bluetooth
                              description: description
                            picture_url:
                              type: string
                              example: >-
                                https://http2.mlstatic.com/resources/frontend/statics/growth-sellers-landings/device-mlb-point-i_medium@2x.png
                              description: picture_url
                            category_id:
                              type: string
                              example: electronics
                              description: category_id
                            quantity:
                              type: number
                              example: 1
                              description: quantity
                            unit_price:
                              type: number
                              example: 58.8
                              description: unit_price
                        description: items
                      payer:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          registration_date:
                            type: string
                            example: 2019-01-01T15:01:01.000Z
                            description: registration_date
                        description: payer
                      shipments:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          receiver_address:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              street_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Av das Nacoes Unidas
                                description: street_name
                              street_number:
                                type: number
                                example: 3003
                                description: street_number
                              zip_code:
                                type: string
                                example: 6233200
                                description: zip_code
                              city_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Buzios
                                description: city_name
                              state_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Rio de Janeiro
                                description: state_name
                            description: receiver_address
                        description: shipments
                    description: additional_info
                  order:
                    type: object
                    description: order
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: MP0001
                    description: external_reference
                  transaction_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 58.8
                    description: transaction_amount
                  transaction_amount_refunded:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: transaction_amount_refunded
                  coupon_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: coupon_amount
                  differential_pricing_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: differential_pricing_id
                  deduction_schema:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: deduction_schema
                  transaction_details:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      payment_method_reference_id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: payment_method_reference_id
                      net_received_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 56.16
                        description: net_received_amount
                      total_paid_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 58.8
                        description: total_paid_amount
                      overpaid_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 0
                        description: overpaid_amount
                      external_resource_url:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: external_resource_url
                      installment_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 58.8
                        description: installment_amount
                      financial_institution:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: financial_institution
                      payable_deferral_period:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: payable_deferral_period
                      acquirer_reference:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: acquirer_reference
                    description: transaction_details
                  fee_details:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        type:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/fee_details_type'
                        amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 2.64
                          description: amount
                        fee_payer:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/fee_payer'
                    description: fee_details
                  captured:
                    type: boolean
                    description: captured
                  binary_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: binary_mode
                  call_for_authorize_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: call_for_authorize_id
                  statement_descriptor:
                    type: string
                    example: MercadoPago
                    description: statement_descriptor
                  installments:
                    type: number
                    example: 1
                    description: installments
                  card:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: id
                      first_six_digits:
                        type: string
                        example: 423564
                        description: first_six_digits
                      last_four_digits:
                        type: string
                        example: 5682
                        description: last_four_digits
                      expiration_month:
                        type: number
                        example: 6
                        description: expiration_month
                      expiration_year:
                        type: number
                        example: 2023
                        description: expiration_year
                      date_created:
                        type: string
                        example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                        description: date_created
                      date_last_updated:
                        type: string
                        example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                        description: date_last_updated
                      cardholder:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          name:
                            type: string
                            example: APRO
                            description: name
                          identification:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              number:
                                type: string
                                example: 19119119100
                                description: number
                              type:
                                type: string
                                example: CPF
                                description: type
                            description: identification
                        description: cardholder
                    description: card
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.suaurl.com/notificacoes/
                    description: notification_url
                  processing_mode:
                    type: string
                    example: aggregator
                    description: processing_mode
                  merchant_account_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: merchant_account_id
                  acquirer:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: acquirer
                  merchant_number:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: merchant_number
                  point_of_interaction:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        example: PIX
                        description: Payment type identifier
                      sub_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Secondary identifier of the payment type
                      application_data:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          name:
                            type: string
                            example: NAME_SDK
                            description: Name
                          version:
                            type: string
                            example: VERSION_NUMBER
                            description: Current version
                        description: Information about the application that processes the payment
                      transaction_data:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          qr_code_base64:
                            type: string
                            example: ...
                            description: Base64 representation of the image of the QR code to be scanned to finalize the payment
                          qr_code:
                            type: string
                            example: 00020126600014br.gov.bcb.pix0117test@testuser.com0217dados adicionais520400005303986540510.005802BR5913Maria Silva6008Brasilia62070503***6304E2CA
                            description: Alphanumeric code to copy and paste, used to finalize the payment
                        description: Information on the pending payment that was generated
                    description: Information from the application that processes the payment and receives regulatory data
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 1--Params-Error-
                      - 3--Token-must-be-for-test-
                      - 5--Must-provide-your-access-token-to-proceed-
                      - >-
                        23--The-following-parameters-must-be-valid-date-and-format--yyyy-MM-dd-T-HH-mm-ssz--date-of-expiration-
                      - 1000--Number-of-rows-exceeded-the-limits-
                      - 1001--Date-format-must-be-yyyy-MM-dd-T-HH-mm-ss-SSSZ-
                      - >-
                        2001--Already-posted-the-same-request-in-the-last-minute-
                      - 2002--Customer-not-found-
                      - 2004--POST-to-Gateway-Transactions-API-fail-
                      - 2006--Card-Token-not-found-
                      - 2007--Connection-to-Card-Token-API-fail-
                      - 2009--Card-token-issuer-can-t-be-null-
                      - 2060--The-customer-can-t-be-equal-to-the-collector-
                      - >-
                        3000--You-must-provide-your-cardholder-name-with-your-card-data-
                      - >-
                        3001--You-must-provide-your-cardissuer-id-with-your-card-data-
                      - 3003--Invalid-card-token-id-
                      - 3004--Invalid-parameter-site-id-
                      - >-
                        3005--Not-valid-action--the-resource-is-in-a-state-that-does-not-allow-this-operation--For-more-information-see-the-state-that-has-the-resource-
                      - 3006--Invalid-parameter-cardtoken-id-
                      - 3007--The-parameter-client-id-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - 3008--Not-found-Cardtoken-
                      - 3009--unauthorized-client-id-
                      - 3010--Not-found-card-on-whitelist-
                      - 3011--Not-found-payment-method-
                      - 3012--Invalid-parameter-security-code-length-
                      - >-
                        3013--The-parameter-security-code-is-a-required-field-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - 3014--Invalid-parameter-payment-method-
                      - 3015--Invalid-parameter-card-number-length-
                      - 3016--Invalid-parameter-card-number-
                      - >-
                        3017--The-parameter-card-number-id-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3018--The-parameter-expiration-month-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3019--The-parameter-expiration-year-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3020--The-parameter-cardholder-name-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3021--The-parameter-cardholder-document-number-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3022--The-parameter-cardholder-document-type-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3023--The-parameter-cardholder-document-subtype-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3024--Not-valid-action---partial-refund-unsupported-for-this-transaction-
                      - 3025--Invalid-Auth-Code-
                      - 3026--Invalid-card-id-for-this-payment-method-id-
                      - 3027--Invalid-payment-type-id-
                      - 3028--Invalid-payment-method-id-
                      - 3029--Invalid-card-expiration-month-
                      - 3030--Invalid-card-expiration-year-
                      - 4000--card-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4001--payment-method-id-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4002--transaction-amount-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4003--transaction-amount-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4004--installments-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4005--installments-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4006--payer-atributte-is-malformed-
                      - 4007--site-id-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4012--payer-id-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4013--payer-type-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - >-
                        4015--payment-method-reference-id-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - >-
                        4016--payment-method-reference-id-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4017--status-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4018--payment-id-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4019--payment-id-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4020--notificaction-url-atributte-must-be-url-valid-
                      - >-
                        4021--notificaction-url-atributte-must-be-shorter-than-500-characters-
                      - 4022--metadata-atributte-must-be-a-valid-JSON-
                      - 4023--transaction-amount-atributte-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4024--transaction-amount-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4025--refund-id-can-t-be-null-
                      - 4026--Invalid-coupon-amount-
                      - 4027--campaign-id-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4028--coupon-amount-atributte-must-be-numeric-
                      - 4029--Invalid-payer-type-
                      - 4037--Invalid-transaction-amount-
                      - >-
                        4038--application-fee-cannot-be-bigger-than-transaction-amount-
                      - 4039--application-fee-cannot-be-a-negative-value-
                      - 4050--payer-email-must-be-a-valid-email-
                      - 4051--payer-email-must-be-shorter-than-254-characters-
                      - 7523--Invalid-expiration-date-
        '403':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 4--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-access-this-resource-
                      - >-
                        3002--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-perform-this-action-
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found
  /v1/payments/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get payment
      description: See all the information of a payment through the payment ID
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Id of the payment
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 1
                    description: id
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                    description: date_created
                  date_approved:
                    type: string
                    example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                    description: date_approved
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                    description: date_last_updated
                  date_of_expiration:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: date_of_expiration
                  money_release_date:
                    type: string
                    example: 2017-09-14T11:26:38.000Z
                    description: money_release_date
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  issuer_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: issuer_id
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: string
                    example: account_money
                    description: payment_method_id
                  payment_type_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment_type_id'
                  status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                  status_detail:
                    type: string
                    example: accredited
                    description: status_detail
                  currency_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: Pago Pizza
                    description: description
                  live_mode:

        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 1--Params-Error-
                      - 3--Token-must-be-for-test-
                      - 5--Must-provide-your-access-token-to-proceed-
                      - 1000--Number-of-rows-exceeded-the-limits-
                      - 1001--Date-format-must-be-yyyy-MM-dd-T-HH-mm-ss-SSSZ-
                      - >-
                        2001--Already-posted-the-same-request-in-the-last-minute-
                      - 2002--Customer-not-found-
                      - 2004--POST-to-Gateway-Transactions-API-fail-
                      - 2006--Card-Token-not-found-
                      - 2007--Connection-to-Card-Token-API-fail-
                      - 2009--Card-token-issuer-can-t-be-null-
                      - >-
                        3000--You-must-provide-your-cardholder-name-with-your-card-data-
                      - >-
                        3001--You-must-provide-your-cardissuer-id-with-your-card-data-
                      - 3003--Invalid-card-token-id-
                      - 3004--Invalid-parameter-site-id-
                      - >-
                        3005--Not-valid-action--the-resource-is-in-a-state-that-does-not-allow-this-operation--For-more-information-see-the-state-that-has-the-resource-
                      - 3006--Invalid-parameter-cardtoken-id-
                      - 3007--The-parameter-client-id-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - 3008--Not-found-Cardtoken-
                      - 3009--unauthorized-client-id-
                      - 3010--Not-found-card-on-whitelist-
                      - 3011--Not-found-payment-method-
                      - 3012--Invalid-parameter-security-code-length-
                      - >-
                        3013--The-parameter-security-code-is-a-required-field-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - 3014--Invalid-parameter-payment-method-
                      - 3015--Invalid-parameter-card-number-length-
                      - 3016--Invalid-parameter-card-number-
                      - >-
                        3017--The-parameter-card-number-id-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3018--The-parameter-expiration-month-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3019--The-parameter-expiration-year-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3020--The-parameter-cardholder-name-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3021--The-parameter-cardholder-document-number-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3022--The-parameter-cardholder-document-type-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3023--The-parameter-cardholder-document-subtype-can-not-be-null-or-empty-
                      - >-
                        3024--Not-valid-action---partial-refund-unsupported-for-this-transaction-
                      - 3025--Invalid-Auth-Code-
                      - 3026--Invalid-card-id-for-this-payment-method-id-
                      - 3027--Invalid-payment-type-id-
                      - 3028--Invalid-payment-method-id-
                      - 3029--Invalid-card-expiration-month-
                      - 3030--Invalid-card-expiration-year-
        '403':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 4--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-access-this-resource-
                      - >-
                        3002--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-perform-this-action-
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found-
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Update payment
      description: Renew the details of a payment when you need it. Indicate the payment ID and send the parameters with the information you want to update
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Id of the payment
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                capture:
                  type: boolean
                  description: >-
                    Determines if the payment should be captured (true, default
                    value) or just reserved (false).
                  example: true
                date_of_expiration:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Payment’s expiration date.
                metadata:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Valid JSON that can be attached to the payment to record
                    additional attributes of the merchant.
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    Determines if the payment should be cancelled
                  example: "cancelled"
                transaction_amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Product cost.
                  example: 58.8
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 20359978
                    description: id
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_created
                  date_approved:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_approved
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: date_last_updated
                  date_of_expiration:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: date_of_expiration
                  money_release_date:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-24T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: money_release_date
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  issuer_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 25
                    description: issuer_id
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: string
                    example: visa
                    description: payment_method_id
                  payment_type_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment_type_id'
                  status:
                   $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                  status_detail:
                    type: string
                    example: accredited
                    description: status_detail
                  currency_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      Point Mini a maquininha que dá o dinheiro de suas vendas
                      na hora
                    description: description
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: live_mode
                  sponsor_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: sponsor_id
                  authorization_code:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: authorization_code
                  money_release_schema:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: money_release_schema
                  taxes_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: taxes_amount
                  counter_currency:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: counter_currency
                  shipping_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: shipping_amount
                  pos_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: pos_id
                  store_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: store_id
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 448876418
                    description: collector_id
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        example: 123
                        description: id
                      email:
                        type: string
                        example: test_user_80507629@testuser.com
                        description: email
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 19119119100
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: CPF
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                      type:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/payer_type'
                    description: payer
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                    description: metadata
                  additional_info:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      items:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: PR0001
                              description: id
                            title:
                              type: string
                              example: Point Mini
                              description: title
                            description:
                              type: string
                              example: >-
                                Producto Point para cobros con tarjetas mediante
                                bluetooth
                              description: description
                            picture_url:
                              type: string
                              example: >-
                                https://http2.mlstatic.com/resources/frontend/statics/growth-sellers-landings/device-mlb-point-i_medium@2x.png
                              description: picture_url
                            category_id:
                              type: string
                              example: electronics
                              description: category_id
                            quantity:
                              type: number
                              example: 1
                              description: quantity
                            unit_price:
                              type: number
                              example: 58.8
                              description: unit_price
                        description: items
                      payer:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          registration_date:
                            type: string
                            example: 2019-01-01T15:01:01.000Z
                            description: registration_date
                        description: payer
                      shipments:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          receiver_address:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              street_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Av das Nacoes Unidas
                                description: street_name
                              street_number:
                                type: number
                                example: 3003
                                description: street_number
                              zip_code:
                                type: string
                                example: 6233200
                                description: zip_code
                              city_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Buzios
                                description: city_name
                              state_name:
                                type: string
                                example: Rio de Janeiro
                                description: state_name
                            description: receiver_address
                        description: shipments
                    description: additional_info
                  order:
                    type: object
                    description: order
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: MP0001
                    description: external_reference
                  transaction_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 58.8
                    description: transaction_amount
                  transaction_amount_refunded:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: transaction_amount_refunded
                  coupon_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: coupon_amount
                  differential_pricing_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: differential_pricing_id
                  deduction_schema:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: deduction_schema
                  transaction_details:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      payment_method_reference_id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: payment_method_reference_id
                      net_received_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 56.16
                        description: net_received_amount
                      total_paid_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 58.8
                        description: total_paid_amount
                      overpaid_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 0
                        description: overpaid_amount
                      external_resource_url:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: external_resource_url
                      installment_amount:
                        type: number
                        example: 58.8
                        description: installment_amount
                      financial_institution:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: financial_institution
                      payable_deferral_period:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: payable_deferral_period
                      acquirer_reference:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: acquirer_reference
                    description: transaction_details
                  fee_details:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        type:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/fee_details_type'
                        amount:
                          type: number
                          example: 2.64
                          description: amount
                        fee_payer:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/fee_payer'
                    description: fee_details
                  captured:
                    type: boolean
                    description: captured
                  binary_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: binary_mode
                  call_for_authorize_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: call_for_authorize_id
                  statement_descriptor:
                    type: string
                    example: MercadoPago
                    description: statement_descriptor
                  installments:
                    type: number
                    example: 1
                    description: installments
                  card:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: id
                      first_six_digits:
                        type: string
                        example: 423564
                        description: first_six_digits
                      last_four_digits:
                        type: string
                        example: 5682
                        description: last_four_digits
                      expiration_month:
                        type: number
                        example: 6
                        description: expiration_month
                      expiration_year:
                        type: number
                        example: 2023
                        description: expiration_year
                      date_created:
                        type: string
                        example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                        description: date_created
                      date_last_updated:
                        type: string
                        example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                        description: date_last_updated
                      cardholder:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          name:
                            type: string
                            example: APRO
                            description: name
                          identification:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              number:
                                type: string
                                example: 19119119100
                                description: number
                              type:
                                type: string
                                example: CPF
                                description: type
                            description: identification
                        description: cardholder
                    description: card
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.suaurl.com/notificacoes/
                    description: notification_url
                  processing_mode:
                    type: string
                    example: aggregator
                    description: processing_mode
                  merchant_account_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: merchant_account_id
                  acquirer:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: acquirer
                  merchant_number:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: merchant_number
                  point_of_interaction:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        example: PIX
                        description: Payment type identifier
                      sub_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Secondary identifier of the payment type
                      application_data:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          name:
                            type: string
                            example: NAME_SDK
                            description: Name
                          version:
                            type: string
                            example: VERSION_NUMBER
                            description: Current version
                        description: Information about the application that processes the payment
                      transaction_data:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          qr_code_base64:
                            type: string
                            example: ...
                            description: Base64 representation of the image of the QR code to be scanned to finalize the payment
                          qr_code:
                            type: string
                            example: 00020126600014br.gov.bcb.pix0117test@testuser.com0217dados adicionais520400005303986540510.005802BR5913Maria Silva6008Brasilia62070503***6304E2CA
                            description: Alphanumeric code to copy and paste, used to finalize the payment
                        description: Information on the pending payment that was generated
                    description: Information from the application that processes the payment and receives regulatory data
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 8--The-name-of-the-parameters-is-wrong-
                      - 1004--Invalid-parameters-for-payment_method-API-
                      - 2018--The-action-requested-is-not-valid-for-the-current-payment-state-
                      - 2078--Capture-attribute-must-be-boolean-
                      - 2079--Invalid-value-for-capture-attribute-
        '403':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 4--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-access-this-resource-
                      - >-
                        3002--The-caller-is-not-authorized-to-perform-this-action-
        '404':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 2000--Payment-not-found-
  /v1/payments/search:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Search payments
      description: Search and return payments made in the last twelve months from the search date
      parameters:
        - name: sort
          in: query
          description: Define the field to sort
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: date_created
        - name: criteria
          in: query
          description: The criteria result
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: desc
        - name: external_reference
          in: query
          description: The external reference of the payment
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: ID_REF
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    paging:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        total:
                          type: number
                          example: 17493
                          description: total
                        limit:
                          type: number
                          example: 30
                          description: limit
                        offset:
                          type: number
                          example: 0
                          description: offset
                      description: paging
                    results:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            example: 1
                            description: id
                          date_created:
                            type: string
                            example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                            description: date_created
                          date_approved:
                            type: string
                            example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                            description: date_approved
                          date_last_updated:
                            type: string
                            example: 2017-08-31T11:26:38.000Z
                            description: date_last_updated
                          date_of_expiration:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: date_of_expiration
                          money_release_date:
                            type: string
                            example: 2017-09-14T11:26:38.000Z
                            description: money_release_date
                          operation_type:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                          issuer_id:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: issuer_id
                          payment_method_id:
                            type: string
                            example: account_money
                            description: payment_method_id
                          payment_type_id:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment_type_id'
                          status:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                          status_detail:
                            type: string
                            example: accredited
                            description: status_detail
                          currency_id:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                          description:
                            type: string
                            example: Pago Pizza
                            description: description
                          live_mode:
                            type: boolean
                            description: live_mode
                          sponsor_id:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: sponsor_id
                          authorization_code:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: authorization_code
                          money_release_schema:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: money_release_schema
                          counter_currency:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: counter_currency
                          collector_id:
                            type: string
                            example: 2
                            description: collector_id
                          payer:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                                example: 123
                                description: id
                              email:
                                type: string
                                example: afriend@gmail.com
                                description: email
                              identification:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  type:
                                    type: string
                                    example: DNI
                                    description: type
                                  number:
                                    type: string
                                    example: 12345678
                                    description: number
                                description: identification
                              type:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/payer_type'
                            description: payer
                          metadata:
                            type: object
                            description: metadata
                          additional_info:
                            type: object
                            description: additional_info
                          order:
                            type: object
                            description: order
                          external_reference:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: external_reference
                          transaction_amount:
                            type: number
                            example: 250
                            description: transaction_amount
                          transaction_amount_refunded:
                            type: number
                            example: 0
                            description: transaction_amount_refunded
                          coupon_amount:
                            type: number
                            example: 0
                            description: coupon_amount
                          differential_pricing_id:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: differential_pricing_id
                          deduction_schema:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: deduction_schema
                          transaction_details:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              net_received_amount:
                                type: number
                                example: 250
                                description: net_received_amount
                              total_paid_amount:
                                type: number
                                example: 250
                                description: total_paid_amount
                              overpaid_amount:
                                type: number
                                example: 0
                                description: overpaid_amount
                              external_resource_url:
                                type: string
                                format: nullable
                                description: external_resource_url
                              installment_amount:
                                type: number

components:
  schemas:
    operation_type:
      type: string
      description: Payment type.
      enum:
        - regular_payment -- Typification by default of a purchase being paid using Mercado Pago.
        - money_transfer -- Funds transfer between two users.
        - recurring_payment -- Automatic recurring payment due to an active user subscription.
        - account_fund -- Money income in the user's account.
        - payment_addition -- Addition of money to an existing payment, made through a Mercado Pago account.
        - cellphone_recharge -- Recharge of a user's cellphone account.
        - pos_payment -- Payment done through a Point of Sale.
    entity_type:
      type: string
      description: Entity type of the payer (only for bank transfers).
      example: individual
      enum:
        - individual -- Payer is individual.
        - association -- Payer is an association.
    payer_type:
      type: string
      description: Identification type of the associated payer (mandatory if the Payer is a Customer).
      example: customer
      enum:
        - customer -- Payer is a Customer and belongs to the collector.
        - registered -- The account corresponds to a Mercado Pago registered user.
        - guest -- The payer doesn't have an account.
    order_type:
      type: String
      description: Type of order.
      example: mercadolibre
      enum:
        - mercadolibre -- The order is from Mercado Libre.
        - mercadopago -- It is a Mercado Pago merchant_order.
    currency_id:
      type: string
      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
      example: BRL
      enum:
        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
        - BRL -- Brazilian real.
        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
        - COP -- Colombian peso.
        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
    fee_details_type:
      type: string
      description: Fee detail.
      example: coupon_fee
      enum:
        - mercadopago_fee -- Cost for using Mercado Pago.
        - coupon_fee -- Discount given by a coupon.
        - financing_fee -- Cost of financing.
        - shipping_fee -- Shipping cost.
        - application_fee -- Marketplace comision for the service.
        - discount_fee -- Discount given by the seller through cost absorption.
    fee_payer:
      type: string
      description: Who absorbs the cost.
      example: payer
      enum:
        - collector -- The seller absorbs the cost.
        - payer -- The buyer absorbs the cost.
    status:
      type: string
      example: approved
      description: Payment status.
      enum:
        - pending -- The user has not yet completed the payment process.
        - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
        - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
        - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
        - in_mediation -- Users have initiated a dispute.
        - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
        - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired
        - refunded -- Payment was refunded to the user.
        - charged_back -- Was made a chargeback in the buyer’s credit card.
    payment_type_id:
      type: string
      description: Type of payment method chosen.
      example: credit_card
      enum:
        - account_money -- Money in the Mercado Pago account.
        - ticket -- Printed ticket.
        - bank_transfer -- Wire transfer.
        - atm -- Payment by ATM.
        - credit_card -- Payment by credit card.
        - debit_card -- Payment by debit card.
        - prepaid_card -- Payment by prepaid card.
    refund_source_type:
      type: string
      description: Type of user who issued the refund.
      example: collector
      enum:
        - collector -- The collector issued the refund.
        - operator -- The refund was made by an account's operator.
        - admin -- The refund was made by a Mercado Pago administrator.
        - bpp -- The refund was made by the Mercado Pago's Buyer Protection Program
    barcode_type:
      type: String
      description: Encoding type.
      enum:
        - UCC/EAN 128 -- Encodes data using the Code 128 symbology.
        - Code128C -- High-density alphanumeric code.
        - Code39 -- Media density code.

Error: json: cannot unmarshal object into Go struct field Operation.paths.post.tags of type string
